key.name: toggle-tiling
key.description: Keybinding to toggle between tiled and floating window layout. When enabled, windows snap to Master-Stack layout instantly. When disabled, windows restore to their exact previous positions.

key.name: master-ratio
key.description: Ratio of screen width occupied by the master window (0.2 to 0.8).

key.name: window-gap
key.description: Gap in pixels between tiled windows.
